name: Wordsweeper by POWGI
description:
This brand new word game draws inspiration from the classic puzzle Minesweeper - and is exclusive to POWGI!

Essentially, a crossword puzzle solved using logic, the only clues tell you which letters may be placed in an adjacent square.

Wordsweeper by POWGI contains 120 hand-crafted puzzles with a gentle learning curve.

Please email support@powgi.com if you need assistance. POWGI has excellent support and we'd rather help you than get a bad review.
